instruction: Name three features of the 2020 census.
output: The 2020 census has three key features. First, the census will include the use of the Internet. This means responding to the census will be more convenient and accessible for those who have internet access. Second, the 2020 census will include a new question about citizenship status. This will provide more accurate and reliable information on the citizenship status of US citizens. Third, the 2020 census will make use of more advanced data-collection strategies, such as sampling and aerial photography to determine population counts in remote areas.
